channel.title: transport layer on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in transport layer on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210309
item.description: Transport Layer # Transport services # Application Layer App <-> app such as Outlook (email) Transport layer Process <-> process Data -> segments/datagrams Segment contains transport header + data portions from email Network layer Machine <-> machine Network header + segment Rectangle = app, Diamond = socket, Circle = process Multiplexing/demultiplexing # Connectionless transport: UDP #
